allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix DynamicBind compounds access and add ligand SMILES extraction to PDB tool

- Fix DynamicBind to use correct compounds access notation (ligands.compounds not ligands.datasheets[''compounds''].path)
- Update DynamicBind compounds datasheet to use standardized format (id, format, smiles, ccd)
- Add ligand extraction to PDB tool: automatically detects ligands in structures and fetches SMILES from RCSB REST API
- PDB tool now outputs compounds.csv with standardized format containing ligand information
- Remove Unicode symbols from PDB tool output to fix Windows encoding issues
